sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-row>
      <v-col cols="12">
        <v-text-field
          v-model="newTask"
          label="Add a new task"
          @keyup.enter="addTask"
        ></v-text-field>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>

    <v-row>
      <v-col cols="12">
        <v-list>
          <v-list-item-group v-if="tasks.length">
            <v-list-item v-for="(task, index) in tasks" :key="index">
              <v-list-item-content>
                <v-list-item-title>{{ task }}</v-list-item-title>
              </v-list-item-content>
              <v-list-item-action>
                <v-btn @click="removeTask(index)" icon>
                  <v-icon>mdi-delete</v-icon>
                </v-btn>
              </v-list-item-action>
            </v-list-item>
          </v-list-item-group>
          <v-list-item v-else>
            <v-list-item-content>No tasks available</v-list-item-content>
          </v-list-item>
        </v-list>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      newTask: '',
      tasks: []
    };
  },
  methods: {
    addTask() {
      if (this.newTask.trim()) {
        this.tasks.push(this.newTask.trim());
        this.newTask = '';
      }
    },
    removeTask(index) {
      this.tasks.splice(index, 1);
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style scoped>
/* Add any custom styling here */
</style>
